page.title: 08Home Life in the Butley Area
page.content: I live in a semi-detached house with a kitchen, dining room, living room, three bedrooms and a bathroom. We have a shed, garage and a fairly large garden. We have a car and my parents sister and I all have bicycles. I go to Butley Middle School and my sister goes to school in Woodbridge. As my father i not employed locally we have an evening meal. Often this meal is not eaten with all the family together. A typical meal may consist of lasagna with no meat, as my sister is vegetarian, peas & beans. For pudding we have a yoghurt. My sister and I have a packed lunch at school. Our families favourite outings are to Pleasure Wood Hills and a Chinese meal in a restaurant. Our best holiday was when we went to Tunisia. I have a dog, Tess, and two hamsters. My mum grows house-plants and dad makes ships in bottles. I sing & dance.
